summary: This is a search and seizure warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York, authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy, specifically targeting electronic devices and media containing communications, photographs, and records related to victims.

persons.name: Henry Pitman
persons.context: Issued the search and seizure warrant for the premises at 9 East 71st Street.

events.title: Warrant Execution Deadline
events.description: The search warrant must be executed on or before this date.

events.title: Warrant Issuance
events.description: U.S. Magistrate Judge Henry Pitman issued the search warrant for 9 East 71st Street.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The warrant authorizes the search of Jeffrey Epstein's New York City residence at 9 East 71st Street for evidence of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.
The specific target is electronically stored information, including communications, photographs (especially of teenage girls), and records related to victims and access to devices.
The warrant allows for the seizure or forensic imaging of computers, smartphones, drives, and related equipment, and includes provisions for delayed notice.
The legal basis cited is violations of Title 18, U.S. Code, Sections 371 (conspiracy) and 1591 (sex trafficking of minors).
